ing: 2 (15.5 ounce) cans white or yellow hominy, rinsed and drained
des: "Had a few cans of hominy and came up with this dish. Bonus is, it is quick to prepare. Good for vegetarians too!"
ins: In a saucepan over medium heat, stir together hominy, tomatoes, green chiles, cumin, and garlic. Cook about 7 minutes. Stir in cilantro. Remove from heat, divide into bowls, and top with cheese.
